mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT SNO, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE SUGGEST.ID=ID), '관리자') WRITER, STITLE, SHIT, SRDATE FROM SUGGEST ORDER BY SRDATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUGGEST (SNO, ID, STITLE, STEXT, SRDATE, SGROUP, SSTEP, SINDENT, SIP) VALUES (SUGGEST_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{stitle}, #{stext}, SYSDATE, SUGGEST_SQ.CURRVAL, 0,0, #{sip})
mapper.update: UPDATE SUGGEST SET SHIT = SHIT+1 WHERE SNO=#{sno}
UPDATE SUGGEST SET ID = #{id}, AID = #{aid}, STITLE = #{stitle}, STEXT = #{stext}, SIP = #{sip} WHERE SNO = #{sno}
UPDATE SUGGEST SET SSTEP = SSTEP+1 WHERE SGROUP=#{sgroup} AND SSTEP > #{sstep}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUGGEST (SNO, AID, STITLE, STEXT, SRDATE, SGROUP, SSTEP, SINDENT, SIP) VALUES (SUGGEST_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{aid}, #{stitle}, #{stext}, SYSDATE, #{sgroup}, #{sstep}+1, #{sindent}+1, #{sip})
